description: Igraine attends the same school as Firiel, where her sword fighting skills are rivalled only by Ravenna`s. She agrees to train Firiel for her duel with Ravenna to avenge her friend Roselitte, who she believes was killed by one of the girls in Ravenna`s faction. Later in the series, she is seen fighting dragons side by side with Eusis.
name: Igraine Barnett
